fr.univartois.ili.fsnet.trayDesktop
Class TrayLauncher

java.lang.Object
  fr.univartois.ili.fsnet.trayDesktop.TrayLauncher

public class TrayLauncher
extends Object

The class TrayLauncher creates an instance of the web service and an instance of FSNetTray and add the tray to the system tray

Author:
Matthieu Proucelle
